Package com.spring.web.controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
com.spring.web.controller.LoginController
@Controller public class LoginController extends Object
this controller is used for the login of all users
Author:
stanley Chilton

  • Method Details

    • getLogin

      @GetMapping("/login") public String getLogin(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      this method either redirects to the index page if logged in, or it redirects to the login page if not logged in
      Parameters:
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      - returns the login page html code or redirects to the index page if the user is logged in

    • postLogin

      @PostMapping("/checkLogin") public String postLogin(@ModelAttribute UserTemp loginuser, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Post to process the email and password for the user and log the in if correct
      Parameters:
      loginuser - - this is used to store the values of the user trying to login for secure transfer in an https setting
      model - - used to store attributes that are being sent to the html code in this case the email and password
      session - - stores the user session so the the email address of the client logging in can be stored in it
      Returns:
      - returns the loginerror page or redirects to the index page

    • ExitSpring

      @GetMapping("/exit") public String ExitSpring(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      this method allows the user to logout
      Parameters:
      session - - the variable storing the login status
      Returns:
      - redirects the admin back to the login page

    • createUser

      @GetMapping("/changePass") public String createUser(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      used when redirecting the trainer or sales to the change password page on their first login this has a confirm password system that will reject the change if the passwords do not match
      Parameters:
      model - - stores the values to pass to the html page
      session - - holds the user id that is currently logged in, means that we can access this user within the method
      Returns:
      changepass - address to change pass html

    • updatePassword

      @PostMapping("/updatepassword") public String updatePassword(@ModelAttribute UserTemp tempuser, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Updates sales or trainer account and returns to index page
      Parameters:
      tempuser - - user to used to update pass, aswell as store the confirm password for checking in the backend
      model - - stores the information coming back from the html page
      session - - stores the Id of the user logging in, meaning that we can get their id when we need it
      Returns:
      index - address to index/home page

    • updatePasswordIndex

      @GetMapping("/updatepassword") public String updatePasswordIndex()
      this method is used to return the used home if they try to input the post mapping without posting anything
      Returns:
      returns the used to the html method
